properties.name: key
properties.description: The key that must be used while searching in data provided

properties.name: trigger-char
properties.description: The number of characters to trigger search

properties.name: data-reader
properties.description: Key in JSON datasource for records

properties.name: display-field
properties.description: Name of key inside response data to display on ui.

properties.name: value-field
properties.description: Name of key inside response data.use to send to backend

events.name: onChange
events.description: Fire when select value from input tag
